projectGridLines.title: Social Commerce
projectGridLines.description:
Description: The project involves building a social commerce platform for social media Influencers, Publishers as well as freelancers to market Eureka Forbes products in their network and in-turn earn incentives for each sale powered through them. This will involve exploring existing solutions available in the market as well as building microservices and interfaces to power this platform.


Skill sets: Java, Springboot, Microservices, React, Postgres


Traits expectation: Ability to understand the business requirements and explore available solutions and customise them to our requirements. A self-learner who can quickly grasp concepts related to Java, Spring, Microservices, databases.

Expected learning: Microservices architecture, handling large volume of traffic and optimizing databases/applications to ensure sub 50ms latency. Opportunity to learn the devops culture like CI/CD, containers and Kubernetes. Opportunity to learn from Eureka Forbes top-notch engineering and product leadership. Opportunity to learn marketing and sales concepts while developing the product
